result.eng: I'd like to keep this book if I may.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom an leabhar seo a choimeád más ceadmhach dom
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom an leabhar seo a choimeád más ceadmhach dom
result.html: Ba mhaith liom an leabhar seo a choimeád más ceadmhach domI'd like to keep this book if I may.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom an leaḃar seo a ċoimeád más ceadṁaċ domI'd like to keep this book if I may.

result.eng: What is the title of the book?
result.ga: Cad is teideal don leabhar
result.orig: Cad is teideal don leabhar
result.html: Cad is teideal don leabharWhat is the title of the book?
result.ponchtml: Cad is teideal don leaḃarWhat is the title of the book?

result.eng: 200 copies of the book were sold.
result.ga: Díoladh 200 cóip den leabhar
result.orig: Díoladh 200 cóip den leabhar
result.html: Díoladh 200 cóip den leabhar200 copies of the book were sold.
result.ponchtml: Díolaḋ 200 cóip den leaḃar200 copies of the book were sold.

result.eng: You will find the table of contents at the beginning of the book.
result.ga: Gheobhaidh tú clár na n-ábhar ag tús an leabhair
result.orig: Gheobhaidh tú clár na n-ábhar ag tús an leabhair
result.html: Gheobhaidh tú clár na n-ábhar ag tús an leabhairYou will find the table of contents at the beginning of the book.
result.ponchtml: Ġeoḃaiḋ tú clár na n-áḃar ag tús an leaḃairYou will find the table of contents at the beginning of the book.

result.eng: Many a person in this country doesn't read a book the whole year.
result.ga: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo nach léann leabhar ar bith ó cheann ceann na bliana
result.orig: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo nach léann leabhar ar bith ó cheann ceann na bliana
result.html: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo nach léann leabhar ar bith ó cheann ceann na blianaMany a person in this country doesn't read a book the whole year.
result.ponchtml: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo naċ léann leaḃar ar biṫ ó ċeann ceann na blianaMany a person in this country doesn't read a book the whole year.

result.eng: The abandonment of children is the worst horror in this book.
result.ga: Is é tréigean na bpáistí an t-uafás is measa sa leabhar seo
result.orig: Is é tréigean na bpáistí an t-uafás is measa sa leabhar seo
result.html: Is é tréigean na bpáistí an t-uafás is measa sa leabhar seoThe abandonment of children is the worst horror in this book.
result.ponchtml: Is é tréigean na bpáistí an t-uafás is measa sa leaḃar seoThe abandonment of children is the worst horror in this book.

result.eng: All the rules in this grammar book.
result.ga: Na rialacha uile sa leabhar gramadaí seo
result.orig: Na rialacha uile sa leabhar gramadaí seo
result.html: Na rialacha uile sa leabhar gramadaí seoAll the rules in this grammar book.
result.ponchtml: Na rialaċa uile sa leaḃar gramadaí seoAll the rules in this grammar book.

result.eng: I picked a book in the library.
result.ga: Phioc mé leabhar sa leabharlann
result.orig: Phioc mé leabhar sa leabharlann
result.html: Phioc mé leabhar sa leabharlannI picked a book in the library.
result.ponchtml: Ṗioc mé leaḃar sa leaḃarlannI picked a book in the library.

result.eng: The book deals with drug addicts.
result.ga: Pléann an leabhar le handúiligh drugaí
result.orig: Pléann an leabhar le handúiligh drugaí
result.html: Pléann an leabhar le handúiligh drugaíThe book deals with drug addicts.
result.ponchtml: Pléann an leaḃar le handúiliġ drugaíThe book deals with drug addicts.

result.eng: He wrote a book.
result.ga: Scríobh sé leabhar
result.orig: Scríobh sé leabhar
result.html: Scríobh sé leabharHe wrote a book.
result.ponchtml: Scríoḃ sé leaḃarHe wrote a book.

result.eng: The book was launched yesterday.
result.ga: Seoladh an leabhar inné
result.orig: Seoladh an leabhar inné
result.html: Seoladh an leabhar innéThe book was launched yesterday.
result.ponchtml: Seolaḋ an leaḃar innéThe book was launched yesterday.

result.eng: Give me the book please.
result.ga: Tabhair dom an leabhar le do thoil
result.orig: Tabhair dom an leabhar le do thoil
result.html: Tabhair dom an leabhar le do thoilGive me the book please.
result.ponchtml: Taḃair dom an leaḃar le do ṫoilGive me the book please.

result.eng: The book gave me food for thought.
result.ga: Thug an leabhar ábhar machnaimh dom
result.orig: Thug an leabhar ábhar machnaimh dom
result.html: Thug an leabhar ábhar machnaimh domThe book gave me food for thought.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug an leaḃar áḃar maċnaiṁ domThe book gave me food for thought.

result.eng: He arrived with a book under his arm.
result.ga: Tháinig sé agus leabhar faoina ascaill aige
result.orig: Tháinig sé agus leabhar faoina ascaill aige
result.html: Tháinig sé agus leabhar faoina ascaill aigeHe arrived with a book under his arm.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig sé agus leaḃar faoina ascaill aigeHe arrived with a book under his arm.

result.eng: It took me half a year to write the book.
result.ga: Thóg sé leathbhliain orm an leabhar a scríobh
result.orig: Thóg sé leathbhliain orm an leabhar a scríobh
result.html: Thóg sé leathbhliain orm an leabhar a scríobhIt took me half a year to write the book.
result.ponchtml: Ṫóg sé leaṫḃliain orm an leaḃar a scríoḃIt took me half a year to write the book.

result.eng: The book is on loan.
result.ga: Tá an leabhar ar iasacht
result.orig: Tá an leabhar ar iasacht
result.html: Tá an leabhar ar iasachtThe book is on loan.
result.ponchtml: Tá an leaḃar ar iasaċtThe book is on loan.

result.eng: The book has long been out of print.
result.ga: Tá an leabhar as cló le fada
result.orig: Tá an leabhar as cló le fada
result.html: Tá an leabhar as cló le fadaThe book has long been out of print.
result.ponchtml: Tá an leaḃar as cló le fadaThe book has long been out of print.

result.eng: The hotel looks good, let's book it.
result.ga: Tá cuma na maitheasa ar an óstán cuirimis in áirithe é

result.ponchtml: Tá cuma na maiṫeasa ar an óstán cuirimis in áiriṫe éThe hotel looks good, let's book it.

result.eng: I'll book a table.
result.ga: Cuirfidh mé bord in áirithe
result.orig: Cuirfidh mé bord in áirithe
result.html: Cuirfidh mé bord in áiritheI'll book a table.
result.ponchtml: Cuirfiḋ mé bord in áiriṫeI'll book a table.

result.eng: He pulled a book towards himself, wrote something in it, and closed it again.
result.ga: Tharraing sé air leabhar scríobh dornán inti agus dhruid arís í
result.orig: Tharraing sé air leabhar scríobh dornán inti agus dhruid arís í
result.html: Tharraing sé air leabhar scríobh dornán inti agus dhruid arís íHe pulled a book towards himself, wrote something in it, and closed it again.
result.ponchtml: Ṫarraing sé air leaḃar scríoḃ dornán inti agus ḋruid arís íHe pulled a book towards himself, wrote something in it, and closed it again.

result.eng: The master pulled towards himself the big book.
result.ga: Tharraing an máistir air an leabhar mór
